enableSynctex.title: Enable SyncTeX
enableSynctex.description: Enable SyncTeX for forward and backward search between source and PDF. Required for pdf-viewer synctex features.

cleanAuxFiles.title: Clean auxiliary files after build
cleanAuxFiles.description: Remove auxiliary files (.aux, .log, .out, etc.) after successful compilation.

cleanExtensions.title: Clean patterns
cleanExtensions.description: List of file extensions to remove when cleaning (comma-separated, without dots). Used by the clean command.

shellEscape.title: Enable shell escape
shellEscape.description: Enable shell escape (-shell-escape) for packages that need to execute external commands. WARNING: Only enable for trusted documents.

debug.title: Debug Mode
debug.description: Enable debug messages in the developer console.

suppressErrors.title: Suppress Errors
suppressErrors.description: Hide error messages from the linter panel.

suppressWarnings.title: Suppress Warnings
suppressWarnings.description: Hide warning messages from the linter panel.

suppressInfos.title: Suppress Infos
suppressInfos.description: Hide info messages from the linter panel.
